task.title: Fix Nango popup blocked by browser - use constructor pattern

events.content: Pass connectSessionToken to Nango constructor instead of using setSessionToken(): Pass connectSessionToken to Nango constructor instead of using setSessionToken()

raw.question: Pass connectSessionToken to Nango constructor instead of using setSessionToken()
raw.chosen: Pass connectSessionToken to Nango constructor instead of using setSessionToken()
raw.reasoning: The prpm app pattern works: new Nango({ connectSessionToken }) followed by openConnectUI(). This differs from our broken approach of new Nango() + setSessionToken() + open(). When the token is passed via constructor, Nango internally handles the popup differently and avoids browser popup blockers.

retrospective.summary: Fixed popup:blocked_by_browser error by using Nango constructor pattern: new Nango({ connectSessionToken }) instead of setSessionToken(). Updated login, signup, and connect-repos pages to match prpm app pattern.
